# HBEST

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`HBEST` is an `R` package that implements the nonparametric hierarchical Bayesian spectral analysis method known as HBEST. The details of this method can be found in @lee_hierarchical_2025. A detailed example using the function `HBEST()` can be found in the vignette.

## Installation

You can install the development version of HBEST from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("llrebecca21/HBEST")
```

```{r example}
library(HBEST)
```
